Summary of the Role

  • You set the tone of the meeting and get the audience thinking.

    • Before the meeting:
  • Send your thought of the day to the Toastmaster and the President and the Vice President Education.

    • At the meeting:
  • Read the thought of the day.
  • Explain why you chose this quote as your thought of the day
